description: Remediation at the Fireside Maintenance Camp along the Alaska Highway (Highway 97).
full_summary:
**Contract: EZ897-230374 - In Situ Remediation at Fireside Maintenance Camp**
===========================================================

**Tender Information**
--------------------

*   **Contract Title**: In Situ Remediation at Fireside Maintenance Camp
*   **Tender Reference Number**: WS3695735645-Doc3709839808
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3695735645
*   **Amendment Number**: 2
*   **Publication Date**: October 18, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 2, 2022, at 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date**: January 23, 2023
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 7, 2022
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: None

**Contract Details**
-------------------

*   **Procurement Category**: Construction Services
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia
*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Performance Criteria**
----------------------

*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Tender Description**
-------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to participate in a selective tendering process for in situ remediation services at the Fireside Maintenance Camp located along Highway 97 in the northern region of British Columbia.

**Contact Information**
-------------------

*   **Contact Name**: Leung, Janie (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email**: [janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**
----------

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14399599?extsite=MTQzOTk1OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please refer to the [official government tender announcement](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14399599?extsite=MTQzOTk1OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for all tender details and instructions.
